H0.text: most polluted city in the world according to world health organization. New Delhi, India

H1.text: most polluted city in the world according to world health organization. Beijing, China

H2.text: most polluted city in the world according to world health organization. Lahore, Pakistan

H3.text: most polluted city in the world according to world health organization. Zabol

A4.text: The World Health Organization ranked New Delhi as the world's worst polluted city in 2014 among about 1,600 cities the organisation tracked around the world.

A5.text: According to the World Air Quality Report 2024, Lahore is one of the world's most polluted city.

A6.text: The World Health Organization to name Zabol the most polluted city in the world in 2016.
